sentences.sentence: Their pet rabbit had gone to the great rabbit hutch in the sky.
sentences.translation: 他们的宠物兔已回到西天的兔宫了。

sentences.sentence: He caught sight of the two little ragged boys behind the green swan-hutch.
sentences.translation: 他看见两个衣衫褴褛的小男孩站在绿天鹅窝后面。

sentences.sentence: Elizabeth Glaser was a beautiful, intelligent woman, the wife of Paul Michael Glaser, who had starred in the successful TV series Starsky and Hutch.
sentences.translation: 伊丽莎白·格拉泽是一个美丽聪明的女子，是保罗·迈克尔·格拉泽的妻子，她丈夫曾在大获成功的电视连续剧《警界双雄》中出任主角。
